TopicTitle: Kerbin Cup Unofficial Team Entries - On hold

Articles.Content:
When must the registration be made, and for what duration is the contest?

Sorry, this information is likely posted somewhere else, but I can't find it.

Top of general, page 1. As for the duration probably 4-5 weeks.

Top of general, page 1. As for the duration probably 4-5 weeks.

H'm. I'm away from my computer for the next week (will be back Saturday), will this eliminate me from the first round of the competition? I would hate to join, then immediately die without posting a single valid entry.

No one would solo this, would they?

No one would indeed solo this.

I will be attempting to compete solo.

Ya know what? I'll fill out any team space that's empty, if there still is one after the dust settles. I'm not a picky guy, and I think that I could be a valuable addition to the team of your choice.

I know that time's technically up, but SQUAD never seems on time for anything, so I hope that I'll still be capable of qualifying.

I know that time's technically up

I believe team selection still has one hour thirty minutes to go.

Anyone who hasn't PMed the mods about entering solo/in a team, ya'll need to do that NOW. Less than 1 hour to go, people!

Let's show those Redditors who's boss!
Yea it's them, wait, no...US!

Anyone who hasn't PMed the mods about entering solo/in a team, ya'll need to do that NOW. Less than 1 hour to go, people!

Let's show those Redditors who's boss!

I thought all teams/soloers were unofficial besides 4?
Only teams who have 4 members and who have PMed the mods are official.
were the individual team members supposed to pm the mods, or just the team leader?

were the individual team members supposed to pm the mods, or just the team leader?

Really the leaders, but a member could do so if their team has not done so beforehand.
*Buzzer sound*

*Buzzer sound*

Is this because the deadline is up?

Is this because the deadline is up?

Yup. Time to see who we need to send off to battle reddit for the golden Kerbal!
so what happens now?

so what happens now?

In the timeless words of Team Fortress 2's medic...

"Now? Let's go practice medicine...."

No, in all seriousness we wait. For the mods to decide or set up a vote.

Just in case you dont read the other thread.

and is it able to work with three members on a team?

I don't think so

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d like to register for the contest too. What do I need to do?

If you want to be listed in solos or have a team formed with 3 or more people PM me and I'll list you/you guys.

NOTE: I will be at graduation playing in the band (buuuuh duh duh du, duuuuh, duuuuuuh < pomp and circumstance) so I probably won't be editing the challenge or the team listings until later tonight. It's 6:55 AM this morning and these will be the last changes until at least 4 PM, most likely later. Mods you can edit the challenge when it is announced if you see this. Everyone else look else where for the official challenge. Thanks all!
